note: Yeah, well, Dave's just some guy who's really into Linux, whether on his devices or on his servers. Sometimes he writes stuff on his blog at https://dalek.zone ... Other times, he just sits there staring at the screen. Dave was wondering why the human race is letting the world go to hell... Then he figured maybe he should say something... not that anybody seems to listen, but what the heck... Dave's websites are some of the most-unvisited places on the Internet...

name: Linux
value: Dave really loves Linux, and uses it on his computers and his servers (KDE and Ubuntu are his favorites)

name: Open Source
value: Dave loves installing and hacking Open-Source software

name: Guitar
value: Dave occasionally picks up his guitar and makes noise

name: Harmonica
value: Sometimes Dave puts down the guitar and plays stuff on his chromatic harmonica (it's easier to travel and run with a harmonica)
